  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:oai.cnice.mec.es:mats_508</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>mats_508</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Ecuaciones Exponenciales</string>
            <string language="en">Exponential equations</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Exponentiale Gleichungen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Équations exponentielles</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Equações exponenciais</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Equazioni esponenziali</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εκθετικές εξισώσεις</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">unidad didáctica que desarrolla mediante simulaciones las ecuaciones exponenciales. Se estudian distintos procedimientos de resolución dependiendo del nivel de dificultad: igualando exponentes, sacando factor común y mediante ecuación de segundo grado.</string>
            <string language="en">teaching unit which uses simulations to study exponential equations and the different procedures to solve them: equating exponents, rearranging the multiplications and using a quadratic equation.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">exponencial</string>
            <string language="en">exponential</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">ecuación</string>
            <string language="en">equation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">igualar</string>
            <string language="en">equate</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">segundo grado</string>
            <string language="en">quadratic</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">exponentes</string>
            <string language="en">exponent</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">factor común</string>
            <string language="en">common factor</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">unterrichtende Maßeinheit welcher Gebrauch 
Simulationen, exponentiale Gleichungen und die unterschiedlichen 
Prozeduren zu studieren, um sie zu lösen: Gleichstellung 
Exponenten, die Vermehrungen und das Verwenden einer quadratischen 
Gleichung umordnend.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">unité d'enseignement quelles utilisations 
simulations d'étudier des équations exponentielles et les 
différentes procédures pour les résoudre : égalisant des 
exposants, réarrangeant les multiplications et utiliser une équation
quadratique.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">unidade ensinando que usos simulações estudar 
equações exponenciais e os procedimentos diferentes para 
resolvê-los: igualando exponentes, rearranjando as 
multiplicações e usar uma equação quadrática.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">unità d'istruzione quali usi simulazioni 
studiare le equazioni esponenziali e le procedure differenti per 
risolverle: identificando gli esponenti, riorganizzando le 
moltiplicazioni ed usando un'equazione quadratica.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μονάδα διδασκαλίας που χρησιμοποιεί τις προσομοιώσεις 
στις εκθετικές εξισώσεις μελέτης και τις διαφορετικές διαδικασίες
για να τους λύσει: εξίσωση των εκθετών, εκ νέου ρύθμιση των
πολλαπλασιασμών και χρησιμοποίηση μιας δευτέρου βαθμού εξίσωσης.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">exponential</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gleichung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">stellen Sie gleich</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">quadratisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Exponent</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">geläufiger Faktor</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">facteur commun</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>
